text: The following is a list of deaths that should be noted in June 2020. For deaths that should be noted before the month that the world is in, please see "Months". Individuals listed must have notability. Names under each date are noted in the order of the alphabet by last name or pseudonym. Deaths of non- humans are noted here also if it is worth noting. Each listing of a death must have a source. If no reference is included, the death notice will be removed. The following are the requirements of adding a name to the list in its order: name, age, where they came from, what the person is known for, cause of death (if known) and a source. ==June== thumb|right|120px| ===1=== *Javier Alva Orlandini, 92, Peruvian politician, Congressman (1963–1968, 1980–1985, 1990–1992, 1995–2000), Vice President (1980–1985) and President of the Senate (1981–1982), 1985 presidential candidate.Javier Alva Orlandini, figura histórica de Acción Popular, falleció este lunes *Jean-Michel Cadiot, 67, French novelist and journalist.Décès. Jean-Michel Cadiot, un journaliste de passion *Silver Donald Cameron, 82, Canadian journalist and environmental author, lung cancer. *Pat Dye, 80, American Hall of Fame college football player (Georgia Bulldogs, Edmonton Eskimos), athletic director and coach (Auburn Tigers) and writer, liver and kidney failure.Pat Dye, legendary Auburn football coach, dies at 80 *Asif Farrukhi, 60, Pakistani translator and editor.Pakistani writer Asif Farrukhi passes away *Majek Fashek, 57, Nigerian reggae singer-songwriter and guitarist, esophageal cancer.Nigerian reggae legend Majek Fashek dies at 57 *Lee Grosscup, 83, American football player (New York Giants) and broadcaster, problems caused by a fall.Cal Football: Beloved, Long-Time Bears Broadcaster Lee Grosscup Dies at 83 *Joey Image, 63, American drummer (Misfits), liver cancer.Misfits drummer Joey Image reportedly dead at 63 *Wajid Khan, 43, Indian movie composer (Garv: Pride & Honour, Hello, Ek Tha Tiger), COVID-19 and kidney infection. *Janez Kocijančič, 78, Slovenian politician and lawyer, President of the Slovenian Olympic Committee (1991–2014) and Deputy (1993–1996).EOC President Kocijančič dies aged 78 following illness *Ron Larrieu, 83, American Olympic athlete (1964).Ron Larrieu *Nicolas Rea, 3rd Baron Rea, 91, British politician, member of the House of Lords (since 1982).Lord Rea Labour *Piotr Rocki, 46, Polish footballer (Polonia Warsaw, Górnik Zabrze, Dyskobolia Grodzisk Wielkopolski), aneurysm.Piotr Rocki nie żyje. Poruszający wpis jego syna *Mariya Shtepa, 95, Ukrainian writer.Померла легендарна зв’язкова УПА Марія Штепа *Pedro Ercílio Simon, 78, Brazilian Roman Catholic prelate, Bishop of Uruguaiana (1995–1998) and Archbishop of Passo Fundo (2011–2012).Archbishop Pedro Ercílio Simon *Myroslav Skoryk, 82, Ukrainian composer, Director of the National Opera of Ukraine (2011–2016).Помер український композитор Мирослав Скорик *Josef Smolka, 81, Czech volleyball player, Olympic bronze medalist (1968).Josef Smolka *Christoph Sydow, 35, German journalist (Der Spiegel), suicide.Zum Tod von Christoph Sydow: Mensch, Christoph! ===2=== *Arrogate, 7, American Thoroughbred racehorse, Breeders' Cup Classic winner (2016) and American Champion Three-Year-Old Male Horse (2016), euthanized.Juddmonte Champion Arrogate Dies at 7 *Werner Böhm, 78, German singer and musician, Eurovision entrant (1982).Werner Böhm alias Gottlieb Wendehals gestorben *Geoffrey Burnstock, 91, English-born Australian neuroscientist, created the term purinergic signalling.Burnstock *Paolo Fabbri, 81, Italian semiotician.Addio al semiologo Paolo Fabbri, ha svelato i meccanismi del linguaggio e dell'arte *Roberto Gervaso, 82, Italian writer and journalist, cancer.È morto Roberto Gervaso. Giuseppe Matarrese *Ilija Petković, 74, Serbian football player (OFK Beograd, Yugoslavia national team) and manager (national team), problems caused by an ulcer and COVID-19.Preminuo Ilija Petković fotbalul ieşean: s-a stins Romilă II *Sander Schnitger, 61, Dutch Air Force general, Commander of the Royal Netherlands Air Force (2012–2016).Voormalig Luchtmacht commandant Sander Schnitger overleden
